id: The Spice Girls Have Replaced "Girl Power" With "People Power"
paragraph:
"Stop right now, thank you very much."
        "We’re about equality and bringing everyone together," she said.#SpiceGirls@NME Me: I’m so excited for the Spice Girls reunion! Girl power!!! 

Them: it’s people power 

Me:I can't believe the Spice Girls took an already completely benign statement and All Lives Matter-ed it. We live in hell. https://t.co/qOuUVUZxLr@NME Stop Right Now, thank you very much.@NME Previously in "all lives matter" and "heteropobia IS a thing!!!"...@NME Posh knew what she was doing staying away from this nonsense. 😒@NME Does that mean they’ll now be known as The Spice People?Great!
